{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:29.879

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.240
    | text      = Right, right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:35.240

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.600
    | text      = about Carrie Cassidy and Project Camelot and Mark Richards, and his actions seem very suspicious
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:46.799
    | text      = to me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:47.799
    | text      = So, I want to give a little bit of an introduction for everybody who needs a little bit, a quick
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:51.580
    | text      = reference on what has happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.720
    | text      = Oh, are you going to channel him?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:55.360
    | text      = Previously on Wacky Wednesday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:57.740

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:59.559
    | text      = In our channeling world, in our channeling world, you got to do the voice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:03.840
    | text      = So for those who need a refresher, early on in doing this podcast, this Knowledge Fight
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:08.919
    | text      = here, we realized that talking about Alex Jones all the time was not good for anyone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.779
    | text      = To give ourselves and the audience a break, we would take periodic little trips, little
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.840
    | text      = excursions to talk about people who claim to have been to space and claim to talk to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.159
    | text      = aliens, who have been interviewed on a show called Project Camelot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.159
    | text      = Project Camelot is hosted by Carrie Cassidy, the least credulous woman on the planet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:31.360
    | text      = Initially, it was all a lot of fun with super soldiers and chocolate stealing raptors, until
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.240
    | text      = over time it became clear that Carrie was holding some of the same underlying bigotries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.759
    | text      = we see in other right wing outlets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.799
    | text      = Every goddamn time, we're like, hey, this is fun and delightful.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:46.519
    | text      = No, it's all antisemitism, dammit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.919
    | text      = Her support for the protocols of the elders of Zion was certainly troubling, and I can't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:53.159
    | text      = say I'm thrilled with some of her other comments about Jews, generally speaking, and suspicions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:57.639
    | text      = of...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:59.639
    | text      = So over time, it became less whimsical and fun to listen to her show, but her interviews
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.480
    | text      = with Captain Mark Richards were still required viewing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.360
    | text      = Dynamite.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:07.360
    | text      = Mark Richards is a man who paid a teenager to kill a guy who owed him money back in the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:11.120
    | text      = 80s, and has been in prison ever since.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.820
    | text      = While in prison, he's concocted an elaborate story about how he's innocent because he was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:17.700
    | text      = secretly off planet at the time of the murder, doing a space mission in his sentient spacecraft
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:22.600
    | text      = whose name is Minerva.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.080
    | text      = And so far, there are no holes in that story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.720
    | text      = He knows everything about human politics and galactic affairs, and the only journalist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:31.519
    | text      = he'll talk to is Carrie Cassidy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.279
    | text      = Because he's in prison, Carrie can't really interview him, so she just goes to the jail,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.200
    | text      = talks to him, and then sits down in front of a webcam when she gets home and reviews
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.600
    | text      = her notes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:42.600
    | text      = Thus, the name of her series about Mark Richards, Total Recall.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.879
    | text      = Leave aside for a moment that that's a reference to a movie based on Philip K. Dick's short
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.299
    | text      = story that plays with the idea of whether or not memories are real.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.279
    | text      = That's not important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:55.759
    | text      = Over the years, Mark has told Carrie some absolutely insane shit, which she then reports
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.340
    | text      = to her audience as gospel, coming from a very real and very reliable source who definitely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.980
    | text      = isn't a murderer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.139
    | text      = He's a noble space captain who's friends with raptors and the enemy of the evil reptoids.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:10.519
    | text      = He's got a hell of a resume.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:12.919
    | text      = He does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:13.919
    | text      = I will give him a fake resume as long as the day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.639
    | text      = Enter Kevin Moore, a British documentarian and channeler.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:22.399
    | text      = For years, Kevin hosted a program called, and still does in some fashion, called the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.399
    | text      = Kevin Moore Show, where he interviews some of the dubious, dubious people about paranormal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.440
    | text      = and new age kinds of topics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.679
    | text      = He's had Carrie Cassidy on as a guest and even interviewed Mark's wife, Joanne Richards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.519
    | text      = He's shown no signs of thinking that what they were doing was absurd.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.159
    | text      = In his interview with Joanne, he completely went along with her stories about Mark being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.720
    | text      = a secret space captain who was framed for murder.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:51.159
    | text      = Something changed at some point, and now Kevin is directing a documentary series about Mark
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.639
    | text      = Richards being a murderer and how Carrie, Joanne, and another pro-Mark figure named
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.000
    | text      = Simon Parks are all basically in a cult.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:03.080
    | text      = Obviously, Kevin is right about that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.720
    | text      = Well, for one, I'm glad that somebody's finally tackling this subject of Mark Richards being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:12.320
    | text      = a liar because for the longest time when we've talked about it, we both assumed he was telling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:16.679
    | text      = the truth, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:17.679
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:18.679
    | text      = He's really opened my eyes on the subject.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:21.080
    | text      = But he's right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:22.080
    | text      = Mark is definitely a murderer, and his defenders are all delusional to some extent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:26.240
    | text      = But even if I agree with that conclusion, something doesn't sit right with me about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.779
    | text      = how Kevin reached the conclusion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:31.919
    | text      = He had no credentials as being a person who would have scruples, but now he's positioning
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:35.960
    | text      = himself as someone who is going to expose a major fraud in the paranormal and UFO communities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.799
    | text      = I didn't get it, so I started looking into it, and this is all still recap.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:46.279
    | text      = Well, let's not forget.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:48.840
    | text      = He still does not have any scruples.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:50.559
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:51.559
    | text      = This is not a sea change.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:53.779
    | text      = This is an isolated incident of him trying to do one, I suppose, good thing, still surrounded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:59.919
    | text      = with scamming people for hundreds and hundreds of dollars a minute.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.320
    | text      = In looking into Kevin Moore so far in the past, I see nothing but a picture of a completely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:09.220
    | text      = uncompelling charlatan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:11.360
    | text      = He has videos that we've talked about where he channels aliens like this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:15.120
    | text      = We come to you as many.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.039
    | text      = The gift of Kevin is the gift to be able to channel multiple entities, multiple beings,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.840
    | text      = and that is a true gift in this special time on planet Earth right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:50.360
    | text      = He doesn't need to change his voice or act in a different way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.720
    | text      = This is an agreement we have with him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:59.879
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.879
    | text      = So he has-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:01.879
    | text      = Never going to get tired of that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:03.159
    | text      = No, it's fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:04.159
    | text      = Never going to get tired of that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:05.159
    | text      = So he has videos where he's channeling aliens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:07.519
    | text      = There's no rigorous standards of proof of what he's doing here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:10.639
    | text      = He runs a psychic hotline.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.399
    | text      = He's used his show to give largely uncritical interviews to all manner of dubious folks
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:16.759
    | text      = like the employees of his psychic hotline or the guy from Apex TV who claims to talk
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.419
    | text      = to time travelers, but he's really just creating viral hoax content probably for ad revenue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:27.440
    | text      = Kevin claims that he's making this documentary series because what Kerry and Mark are doing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:31.000
    | text      = is bad for the community of alternative folks because they don't do their research.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:34.799
    | text      = They haven't done the... They're giving it a bad name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:37.720
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:38.720
    | text      = What they're doing is not real, whereas presumably what Kevin is doing is based on reality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:43.440
    | text      = It's an absurd justification for the documentary, so I reject it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:47.340
    | text      = If we accept that that can't possibly be why he's doing what he's doing, we're left to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:51.639
    | text      = ask, what's really going on?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:54.960
    | text      = I can't pretend to tell you that I've solved this mystery, but I had a little bit of a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:58.320
    | text      = theory and I explored it, and I'm going to present that theory to you today.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:02.360
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:03.360
    | text      = One of the primary things that's bothered me about this whole thing is where's the money
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:06.679
    | text      = coming from?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:07.679
    | text      = So, bigger question, is Kerry his mom?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.360
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.360
    | text      = Okay, never mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:12.360
    | text      = You've already pitched that Mark is his dad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.519
    | text      = I know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:16.519
    | text      = I've got one theory.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:17.799
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:18.799
    | text      = Where's the money coming from, Jordan?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.240
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:21.240
    | text      = Is Kevin more independently wealthy?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:22.320
    | text      = Did he sell off a business 10 years ago that's funding this whole thing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.279
    | text      = It's a relevant question because he's clearly traveling all over the place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:30.440
    | text      = There's videos of him flying around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.600
    | text      = He's going to California to try and track down people involved in Mark's case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:37.399
    | text      = He's jet setting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:39.639
    | text      = For this documentary, he's gone all over the place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.240
    | text      = I will say that he has way higher production value than a lot of the folks I come across
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:46.159
    | text      = in this space weirdo community.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:47.399
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.399
    | text      = It'd be weird if Ken Burns was producing this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.240
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.279
    | text      = Even assuming he's a naturally talented video producer, there's still some money going into
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:55.840
    | text      = this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.159
    | text      = Trying to answer that question led me back to a video that Kevin posted in 2013 introducing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:03.120
    | text      = a new partnership with the Kevin Moore Show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:06.519
    | text      = The Moore Show is in partnership with Ozark Mountain Publishing, taking readers beyond
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:13.000
    | text      = the unexplained.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:14.559
    | text      = Hello, I'm Kevin Moore, and I host the Moore Show alternative late night talk on radio,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:22.799
    | text      = TV, and online.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:25.200
    | text      = And I'm Joanna Su, producer of the Moore Show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:28.360
    | text      = We are proud to announce that the Moore Show is now in partnership with Ozark Mountain
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:33.080
    | text      = Publishing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:34.080
    | text      = The Moore Show alternative late night talk is on the leading edge of alternative radio
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.559
    | text      = and TV programming in the UK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:42.720
    | text      = The show's mission is to uplift and awaken human consciousness through bold and powerful
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:48.279
    | text      = interviews with paranormal researchers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.039
    | text      = This goes on for a while.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:52.039
    | text      = Yeah, I believe it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:53.039
    | text      = So, but it also gets to the end, and it's talking about, you know, we're to sell the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:57.279
    | text      = books of Ozark Mountain Publishing, and we're going to launch a platform where you can buy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:02.080
    | text      = advertising.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:03.080
    | text      = So, it's a comprehensive partnership.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:05.839
    | text      = See, this is interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:07.839
    | text      = Ozark Mountain Publishing is not a super huge publishing outlet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:11.480
    | text      = So, it seems strange that they would be partnering up with a not super huge paranormal show all
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:16.920
    | text      = the way across the Atlantic Ocean.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.359
    | text      = It's hard to say exactly what kind of revenue Ozark Mountain Publishing is pulling in, but
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.119
    | text      = a review on Glassdoor from a former employee complains that working there involves a, quote,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:27.680
    | text      = crazy family-managed environment, and says that it's a small company with less than 50
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:32.160
    | text      = employees.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:33.160
    | text      = Yeah, that sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:34.599
    | text      = I don't know why.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:35.599
    | text      = I think for some reason I'm prejudiced against any company that is like Ozark Mountain or
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.119
    | text      = Ozark.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:41.119
    | text      = What about the Ozark water bottle company?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:43.599
    | text      = See, I mean, they make water bottles, so they're bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:47.359
    | text      = That makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:48.359
    | text      = What about Lake of the Ozarks?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:49.359
    | text      = Have you ever been there?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:50.359
    | text      = I don't think I have ever been there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:51.359
    | text      = Oh, it's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:52.359
    | text      = Gorgeous, gorgeous lake.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:53.359
    | text      = Have you ever been there?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:54.359
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:55.359
    | text      = It's in the middle of Missouri.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:56.359
    | text      = I think my buddy, his parents had a lake house there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:59.559
    | text      = We went tubing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:00.559
    | text      = Never once.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:01.559
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:02.559
    | text      = It's a good time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:03.559
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:04.559
    | text      = Well, then I retract my Ozark prejudices.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:05.559
    | text      = Ozark is a big, broad term.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:07.240
    | text      = Don't be so biased.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:08.240
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:09.240
    | text      = I'm sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:10.240
    | text      = Ozark Mountain Publishing was founded in 1992 by a woman named Dolores Cannon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:13.680
    | text      = Dolores passed in 2014, but prior to that, she was a bit of a player in the world of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.960
    | text      = the paranormal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:18.960
    | text      = She'd written a ton of books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:21.960
    | text      = She put on the Ozark UFO Conference, which is allegedly currently right now in its 33rd
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.279
    | text      = year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:28.279
    | text      = I'm not sure that's true, but it could be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:29.960
    | text      = I mean, yeah, the Fyre Fest is in its third year, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:33.059
    | text      = Something like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:34.059
    | text      = Third year?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.059
    | text      = 33rd.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:36.059
    | text      = I was being... Never mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:38.039
    | text      = Dolores was doing hypnosis back in the 60s to try and help patients with things like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:42.519
    | text      = smoking and overeating and behavioral issues.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:45.000
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:46.000
    | text      = So she wasn't scamming.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:47.559
    | text      = It's hard to say, but I don't have a gigantically negative sense about Dolores, although I do
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:54.740
    | text      = think she's a little scamming.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:56.200
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.200
    | text      = Everyone in this world kind of is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:58.200
    | text      = They got to be a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:59.200
    | text      = Yeah, but if you're trying to help people quit smoking with hypnosis, that's way better
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:02.119
    | text      = than if you're charging-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:03.119
    | text      = This is back in the 60s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:04.119
    | text      = If you're charging $90 a minute to get psychic readings and shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:07.519
    | text      = We have 70 years to cover-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:09.640
    | text      = That's a good point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:10.640
    | text      = That's a good point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:11.640
    | text      = Fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:12.640
    | text      = In the course of doing her work, she stumbled upon a woman in 1968 who regaled her with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:16.880
    | text      = stories of a past life when she was hypnotized.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:20.359
    | text      = Dolores's work got interrupted when her husband got injured and she had to care for him and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:23.839
    | text      = the family had to relocate to the Ozarks, but by the late 70s, she was back up and running
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:28.839
    | text      = hypnotizing people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:29.839
    | text      = I found a particular line in Dolores's bio pretty funny, quote, her early work was heavily
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:35.720
    | text      = focused on reincarnation, which got her acquainted and comfortable with the concept of time travel,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:41.440
    | text      = which I would say, how could it not?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:43.839
    | text      = I mean, so many reasons?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:46.920
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:47.920
    | text      = I feel like those two things are not related.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:49.319
    | text      = Not necessarily.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:51.559
    | text      = Her work began as past life regression, but eventually grew into what she calls quantum
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:56.420
    | text      = healing hypnosis technique, which is a name that she has trademarked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:59.920
    | text      = All right, now we're back into scammy territory.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:03.079
    | text      = A little.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:04.079
    | text      = As she continued her work in the field, she found resistance on the part of the mainstream
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:07.859
    | text      = book houses to publish her writing and thus she started up Ozark Mountain Publishing in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:12.359
    | text      = 1992 through which she puts up tons of books of her own as well as those of tons of other
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:17.319
    | text      = new age sorts of writers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:19.880
    | text      = Three of the books she put out were of her own that they purport to be the authoritative
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:25.240
    | text      = interpretations of Nostradamus's prophecies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:28.519
    | text      = Three of those books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:29.519
    | text      = Well, it's a three part series.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:30.720
    | text      = It's a three part series.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:31.720
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:32.720
    | text      = She could be certain that they are authoritative because Nostradamus himself told her so.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:36.400
    | text      = Oh, there we, okay, all right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:38.559
    | text      = In a session she was having, her patient began speaking as Nostradamus and told her that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:42.920
    | text      = everyone was getting his shit wrong because of changes to the French language over time
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:47.319
    | text      = and he needed Dolores to write a book to correct the record.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:49.960
    | text      = Of course he did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:51.079
    | text      = I don't believe any of that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:52.380
    | text      = Of course he didn't only write in French, but who cares?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:55.039
    | text      = So, Dolores Cannon runs this publishing house and they've entered into a partnership with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:59.319
    | text      = The Moore Show in 2013, which on its own is kind of weird, but it's not entirely insane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:05.119
    | text      = I know how it can be when you're trying to get your name out there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:07.880
    | text      = Sometimes you make marketing decisions that seem strange to external observers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:11.500
    | text      = Like a couple years ago I bought a Facebook ad for instance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:13.960
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:14.960
    | text      = You know, it happens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:15.960
    | text      = Eh, what are you going to do?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:16.960
    | text      = But here's the thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:17.960
    | text      = This wasn't just Ozark Mountain Publishing buying an ad on Kevin's show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:22.019
    | text      = This was a partnership.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | timestamp = 00:30:30.720
    | text      = That's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:31.720
    | text      = That's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:32.720
    | text      = I wish I had remembered that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:33.720
    | text      = You and your soul group agreed to make it impossible to make dinner plans in order so
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:36.839
    | text      = once you were incarnated on Earth, you and your friends could grow through that frustration.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:42.359
    | text      = You created your own challenge pre-birth in order... It's a New Agey thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:47.720
    | text      = It's pretty common in a lot of these circles to have these... It's a predestination, but
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:53.440
    | text      = also free will.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:54.680
    | text      = There's a lot... Because your mind's wiped, it allows for both to sort of co-exist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:00.140
    | text      = It's where Dolores is at for sure, and it is not where Carrie is at.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:04.400
    | text      = No, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:05.400
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:06.400
    | text      = What we see here is the first indication of a fundamental difference in worldview between
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:09.319
    | text      = these two.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:10.680
    | text      = On the small scale, there's the differing takes on alien abduction, but if you zoom
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:14.400
    | text      = out, this is a microcosm of a much larger disagreement, primarily about what the character
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:19.440
    | text      = of the universe is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:21.680
    | text      = For Carrie, space is a place full of war and different races of aliens doing battle for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:26.119
    | text      = control of, I guess, space resources.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:29.480
    | text      = For Dolores, space is full of love and care.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:32.319
    | text      = It's just an extension of something that's all about us, but also much larger than us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:37.079
    | text      = There's a game going on involving us and other alien races, but we're playing it together,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:42.920
    | text      = and it's about cooperative advancement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:45.119
    | text      = Killer!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:46.279
    | text      = Killer!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:47.279
    | text      = These are entirely incompatible views of the galaxy that these two people have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:51.440
    | text      = I know what she would be called if Larry Nichols were around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:54.359
    | text      = Witch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:55.359
    | text      = She's a witch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:56.519
    | text      = We get to a little bit later in the interview, and they start talking about, like, what aliens
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:06.220
    | text      = are you talking about?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:07.839
    | text      = We instantly find another branching between these two that I don't know how they could
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:13.519
    | text      = possibly bridge this gap.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:15.640
    | text      = You were talking to which groups now?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:18.519
    | text      = They don't have any.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:19.519
    | text      = Witch groups.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:20.519
    | text      = They wouldn't tell you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:21.519
    | text      = I meanâ€"
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:22.519
    | text      = They don't have names.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:23.519
    | text      = But as far as we know, in other words, we know about, for example, Nordics as a general
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:27.720
    | text      = category, and we know about Grays and so on and so forth, even Reptilians.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:32.519
    | text      = Have you gottenâ€"
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:33.519
    | text      = I've contacted them and contacted with all of them and come through at various times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:38.279
    | text      = But when I asked them, where were you from, they said, we don't have a name for where
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:43.640
    | text      = we come from.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:44.640
    | text      = You humans have to put labels on things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:47.880
    | text      = So if you need it, we will give you a label.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:51.319
    | text      = But they said, if we told you we were from the planet out there to the north of the fourth
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:56.599
    | text      = star, you wouldn't know which one it was, because it's not even in your constellation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:01.680
    | text      = books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:02.680
    | text      = That's right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:03.680
    | text      = But they don't come from planets anyway.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:05.039
    | text      = They come from other dimensions and galaxies far, far away, because they travel through
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:10.480
    | text      = dimensions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:11.480
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:12.480
    | text      = And so they said it wouldn't do any good to tell you where we are from.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:16.279
    | text      = And on board the crafts are many, many different kinds, just like Star Trek.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:21.079
    | text      = Just like Star Trek.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:22.079
    | text      = Just like Star Trek.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:23.079
    | text      = So here we have another fundamental disagreement between Carrie and Dolores Cannon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:27.279
    | text      = One of the things that most characterizes Carrie's view of the folks from space is that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:31.160
    | text      = they all belong to rigidly defined groups, and they are defined by the group's characteristics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:37.700
    | text      = The Reptilians are Draco.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:39.480
    | text      = They're pure evil.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:40.480
    | text      = The spider leadership are bad, and they're meddling on Earth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:43.599
    | text      = The mantids were formerly bad, but they've made an alliance, and they might be on our
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:46.900
    | text      = side now, according to Simon Parks or something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:49.079
    | text      = Who knows?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:50.079
    | text      = The raptors are good, and they're our allies, though they will eat babies on occasion and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:53.680
    | text      = will kill you for chocolate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:55.039
    | text      = Which it's like sometimes you got to make a... Look, I mean, Saudi Arabia is technically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:59.680
    | text      = our ally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:00.680
    | text      = You know what I'm saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:01.680
    | text      = Naturally, the Nordics, the aliens most like white people, are unassailably good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:05.720
    | text      = It is weird how they are unassailably good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:08.139
    | text      = That is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:09.139
    | text      = Dolores sees a far more multicultural universe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:13.159
    | text      = Compared to Carrie, her view is downright progressive.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:16.059
    | text      = The labels of alien groups' names are meaningless in the larger picture, and they only exist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:20.159
    | text      = because humans have a need to put labels on things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:23.599
    | text      = In the real world of space, Nordics work alongside raptors, mantids, and reptilians on the same
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:28.559
    | text      = spacecraft.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:30.480
    | text      = It's like Star Trek.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:31.480
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:32.480
    | text      = Obviously, since I don't believe any of this, I'm left to try and find meaning in subtext.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:36.679
    | text      = I feel like the world that Dolores believes in is one where there's unity, where everyone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:40.719
    | text      = can be valued and collaborate, where group labels are meaningless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:44.280
    | text      = Conversely, Carrie seems trapped in a mode of thinking where what group someone is a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:48.639
    | text      = part of dictates certain intrinsic characteristics about them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:53.440
    | text      = Applied to humans, this is what you might call racist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:56.840
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:57.840
    | text      = The way Carrie engages in this stuff, it's not necessarily fair to call it racist, because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:02.079
    | text      = she could easily say that human is the group that we would apply universal characteristics
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:07.280
    | text      = to, in the same way she does with raptor or reptilian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:10.860
    | text      = The problem is in how accepting that kind of thinking allows a person to apply it to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:15.800
    | text      = subgroups pretty easily.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:18.199
    | text      = Carrie may believe that species is the smallest possible group where these kinds of generalizations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:22.820
    | text      = can be made, but I don't trust that position to hold, nor have I ever really heard her
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:26.960
    | text      = articulate that kind of hard and fast line, that kind of rule of like, this kind of thinking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:31.800
    | text      = only applies this far.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:33.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:34.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:35.639
    | text      = It shan't be applied.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:36.639
    | text      = You need to be responsible if you're going to be like, this group is intrinsically this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:41.639
    | text      = way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:42.639
    | text      = This group is intrinsically this way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:44.440
    | text      = You got to be real clear, but you'd better not apply this elsewhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:49.000
    | text      = What we're dealing with here is a classic, did Bill and Ted win or did Bill and Ted lose
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:56.320
    | text      = intergalactic government situation here?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:58.739
    | text      = When Bill and Ted win-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:59.739
    | text      = That's the situation?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:00.739
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:01.739
    | text      = Have you never seen it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:02.739
    | text      = Everybody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:03.739
    | text      = Air guitars, it's fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:04.739
    | text      = It's amazing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:05.739
    | text      = It's like the one bogus journey, whenever the evil Bill and Ted around there, they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:09.599
    | text      = just causing destruction.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:11.139
    | text      = They're just ruining everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:12.960
    | text      = Carrie is the evil Bill and Ted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:15.000
    | text      = This is unassailable logic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:16.320
    | text      = This is an interesting take.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:17.639
    | text      = I'll say that what my perspective is, I appreciate yours, but what I'm saying is that I'm not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:25.199
    | text      = trying to call Carrie's view racist and Dolores's view not racist, but I think what we see here
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:30.760
    | text      = still indicates a profoundly divergent view of the universe between their two worldviews.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:36.599
    | text      = Carrie sees the galaxy as a war zone between distinct groups of alien races, whereas Dolores
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:42.719
    | text      = sees it as a place of growth and evolution, where different groups don't see themselves
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:47.199
    | text      = as different and work towards shared goals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:50.079
    | text      = It's the difference between seeing the universe as primarily conflict and seeing it as primarily
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:55.760
    | text      = cooperation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:57.480
    | text      = It's difficult for me to stress how at odds their positions are, which is very interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:02.519
    | text      = Carrie and Dolores don't seem to hate each other, and their interview is polite enough,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:06.639
    | text      = but they have nothing in common.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:08.280
    | text      = Yeah, that is interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:10.039
    | text      = Although Dolores loses me, actually, and I don't even know if this is brilliant within
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:18.059
    | text      = the context of her statement or if it's exactly as stupid as it sounds, but the idea of an
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:24.119
    | text      = alien race being like, yeah, we're north of that star, north, north, north in space, you're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:32.119
    | text      = north in space, which north?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:34.039
    | text      = I think that she was saying that as an absurd way to look at it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:36.960
    | text      = But see, that's the thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:38.280
    | text      = In the context, she wasn't saying it like, she was saying it like the alien race told
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:43.559
    | text      = her that as a way of saying that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:44.719
    | text      = I don't think that she was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:45.719
    | text      = Yeah, I think she was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:46.719
    | text      = I don't think she was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:47.719
    | text      = I think she was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:48.719
    | text      = I think she was using that as an example of what you would want to hear from an alien
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:52.079
    | text      = and it being meaningless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:53.800
    | text      = That's what, that's how I heard it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:55.280
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:56.280
    | text      = Everything's open to interpretation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:57.280
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:58.280
    | text      = I think there's a lot of fair criticisms of all of these people, but I think that's nitpicky.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:02.960
    | text      = Hey, I'm a hard sci-fi guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:05.679
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:06.679
    | text      = So we get back to alien abductions here in their interview and Dolores says something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:11.159
    | text      = really interesting that I could see Carrie taking personally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:14.440
    | text      = The ideal situation should be that the person never remember anything about the experience
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:20.360
    | text      = because they have been coming since the beginning of the Earth, taking care of humans since
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:25.159
    | text      = the beginning of the Earth, and they don't want to interfere with the individual's life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:30.519
    | text      = We should, because of free will, we should be allowed to just live and experience life
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:35.920
    | text      = as we know it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:36.920
    | text      = We're not supposed to interfere with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:39.239
    | text      = But they said because the chemistry of the brain has changed, the pollutants in the air,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:47.079
    | text      = the additives to the food, if the person is on drugs of any kind, recreational or medical
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:53.840
    | text      = drugs, if they are drinking on alcohol, it changes the chemistry of the brain.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:20.320

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
